author: smetanka
title: Deploying a website on a server/hosting
text: To deploy a flask website on a server with a white IP, we need:
- Connect to the server using SSH to the server
- Transfer all files to a separate folder and move into it
- Mount the virtual environment to the folder using the command: python3 -m venv venv
- Start the virtual environment using the command: source venv/bin/activate
- Install all the necessary libraries (for example flask) using the command: pip install flask
- Create a local variable using the command: export FLASK_APP=app.py (name of your main file instead of app.py)
- Run the site as a background process without logging using the command: nohup flask run --host=0.0.0.0 &
